entry.title: Misc
entry.content:
Music

  • Music is an integral part of my life. Have played the piano for over 15 years. Started composing since 14 years old.
  • I worked as a student lecturer in XJTLU teaching the fundamentals of piano and music theory.
  • Love classical and jazz music. Learning jazz harmony will greatly benefit the color of your music.

entry.title: About me
entry.content:
I am a senior student studying computer science at the University of Liverpool, expected to graduate in June 2022.

I am doing a remote research intern supervised by Prof. Fenglong Ma (Penn State University). I am also working on my final year project under the supervision of Prof. Danushka Bollegala. Previously, I also did bioinformatics project under the supervision of Prof. Jionglong Su and Prof. Meng Jia.

My research interests are vision-language, natural language processing, bioinformatics and AI-composing. I am also actively exploring the fields in visualization.

Ongoing Projects (More details to be released!)

Medical Report Generation

  • Implemented the baseline Code of medical report generation from scratch
  • Exploring attention mechanism to improve the performance

Word Sense Disambiguation

  • Conducting different methodologies in improving the accuracy of word sense disambiguations

Past Projects

Automatic Background Music Matching Website

  • In this project we aimed to build a website to provide suitable music for a give clip of video based on its emotion.
  • I am resposible for the algorithm part and database maintainance part.
  • You can see the demo here: MugicAI demo link.
